questions.question: What space exploration site is known for launching the first human into space in 1961, located in the steppes of Kazakhstan?
questions.context: This iconic site sent Yuri Gagarin into orbit, marking a monumental achievement in the space race.

questions.question: Identify the modern architectural marvel in Dubai, completed in 2010, known as the tallest building in the world.
questions.context: This skyscraper stands at over 828 meters, featuring an observation deck that provides a panoramic view of the cityscape.

questions.question: Which ancient ruin in Egypt is famed for its massive limestone structure built as a tomb for the Pharaoh Khufu around 2560 BC?
questions.context: This is the largest of the three pyramids on the Giza Plateau and one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

questions.question: What historical battle site in Belgium played a crucial role in 1815, marking the end of the Napoleonic Wars?
questions.context: The Battle of Waterloo saw a decisive victory for the coalition led by the Duke of Wellington against Napoleon Bonaparte.

questions.question: Which UNESCO World Heritage Site in India, completed in 1653, is renowned for its colossal white marble mausoleum and gardens?
questions.context: This iconic landmark was commissioned by Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal, symbolizing eternal love.
